alert.note: Alert for Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; Marin Coastal Range; Northern Monterey Bay; Northern Salinas Valley, Hollister Valley and Carmel Valley; San Francisco; San Francisco Bay Shoreline; San Fransisco Peninsula Coast; Santa Cruz Mountains; Sonoma Coastal Range; Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued March 01 at 9:18PM PST until March 02 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures between 33 to 36 will cause very cold conditions. * WHERE...North Bay coastline, portions of the SF Bay Shoreline, lower elevations of Santa Cruz county, and the Northern Salinas Valley including the Hollister area. * WHEN...Until 9 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Cold conditions will impact unsheltered populations or people experiencing power outages. It can also damage crops, other sensitive vegetation. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Don`t forget to protect pets from cold conditions.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
